codesay
********

Documentation for the codesay command in */cmds/wiz/codesay.c*.

USAGE ``codesay <string>``

Displays the string formatted as LPC code.
Useful when discussing/explaining snippets of code.

> ``codesay void create() { ::create(); }``

  |  You say:
  |      void create(){
  |          ::create();
  |      }

.. TAGS: RST
